title: Large Single in Canoga Park close to the Metro
map_address: 7252 Jordan Avenue near Sherman Way/Jordan Avenue
posting_body: Small gated complex in a great location close to the Metro, fast food and West Field Mall.
Separate  kitchen with granite counter tops, beautiful tile floors and breakfast bar for two.
Large full bathroom with a tub and  tile floors.
Spacious living area with new hardwood floors large window and AC.
single, full bathroom, 1 parking space, laundry on site
You are welcome to take a drive by and check out the area.
If interested please call Brenda to schedule an appointment.
Screening fee of $40 per person to be submitted with application only plus provable income.
Small pet welcome with a pet deposit, pet license.
